message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $10,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I'm looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $7,500?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,000? This product is truly top-of-the-line and will exceed your expectations.
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I appreciate the flexibility. Could we possibly agree on $8,500 for the product?
